ncmw.visualization package¶

Submodules¶

ncmw.visualization.community_visualization module¶

ncmw.visualization.community_visualization.plot_community_interaction(model, df, names: dict = {}, cmap: Optional[str] = None)[source]¶

This plots the community interaction as a graph with circular layout, similar to circos plots

Args:

model: Community model (Only implemented for ShuttleCommunity) df: Summary dataframe.

Returns:

figure: Plot

ncmw.visualization.community_visualization.plot_community_uptake_graph(model, df, names: dict = {}, cmap='viridis')[source]¶
ncmw.visualization.community_visualization.plot_pairwise_growth_relation_per_weight(model, names: dict = {})[source]¶

Plots all pairwise growth relationships. for all possible weights $(lpha, 1-lpha)$.

Args:

model: Community model names: Dictionary of model names to display. If empty we will use the model id!

Returns:

figure: Plot

ncmw.visualization.community_visualization.plot_posterior_samples_for_observations(model, observations)[source]¶

This method plots posterior samples p(w|x) where x is the observed biomass values. For this purpuse we assume a Dirichlet prior on weights. This also gurantees that the weights sum to one.

Args:

model: Community Models observations: List of observed biomass values.

Returns:

list : A list of figures for each observation.

ncmw.visualization.community_visualization.plot_reference_interaction(interaction_cutoff=0, cmap='viridis')[source]¶
ncmw.visualization.community_visualization.plot_species_interaction(model, df, names: dict = {}, cmap='viridis', interaction_cutoff=0.0)[source]¶

ncmw.visualization.fva_visualization module¶

ncmw.visualization.fva_visualization.plot_full_fva(fva: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, save_path: Optional[str] = None, label_only_at_flux: int = 5)[source]¶

Plots all exchange fluxes, but only labels the one with large flux values.

Parameters

  • fva (pd.DataFrame) – FVA dataset

  • label_only_at_flux (int, optional) – For which value the label should be shown. Defaults to 5.

ncmw.visualization.fva_visualization.plot_medium_fva_range(model, save_path=None, growth_fraction=1.0)[source]¶

Plots FVA flux ranges for all exchange reactions

ncmw.visualization.growth_visualization module¶

ncmw.visualization.growth_visualization.plot_scaled_medium_growth(models, min_scale=0.1, max_scale=100, evaluations=1000, names: dict = {}, cmap: Optional[str] = None)[source]¶

Plots the growth for scaling the medium by a variable factor K.

Parameters

  • models – Cobra models

  • min_scale – Minimal scale

  • max_scale – Maximal scale

  • evaluations – Number of scales between min_scale and max_scale

  • names – Names dictionary

  • cmap – Color map for colors.

Returns

Plot

Return type

fig

ncmw.visualization.similarity_visualization module¶

ncmw.visualization.similarity_visualization.jacard_index_similarity_heatmap(ji_met, ji_rec, ji_ro, names: dict = {})[source]¶

This plots the similarity between the community members as heatmap.

Parameters

  • ji_met (df) – Jaccard index matrix metabolites

  • ji_rec (df) – Jaccard index matrix reactions

  • ji_ro (df) – Jaccard index matrix resource overlap

  • figsize (tuple, optional) – [description]. Defaults to (10,5).

Returns

Figure

Return type

[fig]

ncmw.visualization.similarity_visualization.uptake_sekretion_venn_diagrams(models, uptakes, sekretions, names: dict = {}, cmap=None)[source]¶
